text: I have a dropdown menu as a language switcher, how do I make it switch to the page with the corresponding language?

Hi folks , I am currently working with a workflow which has custom code for deletion and insertion of records into the custom object . When i test my custom code manually everything works as expected .
But i am facing some issue with the workflow , the issues are as follows :
1. Sometimes the workflow doesn't get executed at all at the scheduled time.
2. The code for deletion takes place fine , but during insertion it inserts the same set of data multiple times. This behavior is a bit abnormal as sometimes the insertions works correct and sometimes it inserts multiple times .
Do anyone of you know what could be the underlying issue and how can i get through this?
It would mean a lot to me if anyone of you could help !

Thank you so much in advance..Happy coding!

forb that font
where do you apply this @font-face rule?

ok i dont have more time right now, but you basically need to disable each module that has the Google Font loading in it and make sure that no font is selected in the Theme Settings, also not as Fallback, basically strip your theme of any font loading, then it should load your font
i have to go into a meeting, hope you can figure it out!
Oh yep thats what I was talking about

HubSpot open sourced all the code for the ticket portal: you can see it all by going to
Marketing=>Files and Templates=>Design Tools=>@HubSpot (in the file manager)=>customer portal
You can clone this and make any edits you want to these files you are going to need to deploy the portal using the cms though (vs the customer portal settings page)
and you won't get auto updates
It's going to take some work on your guys end but it is definitely possible

Hello All!  I would like to maintain an Active List of Contacts based on their location (lat/long) radius distance from another location (lat/long).  I didn’t see the query capabilities in the Contact API, and it doesn’t seem like you can store location data on a Contact as a new field,  so I created a HubDB table with a contact_id column and I have a custom workflow that keeps this updated when the address changes.  I have written logic that allows a user to search for all Contacts in our account by distance to an address.  I can take this list of Contacts and create a static list… but I was curious if there was a way to setup a custom Active List filter.  I noticed we already had a few third party integrations that have List filters in an `INTEGRATION FILTERS` category.  Where would I find the documentation for creating such a filter?  Is there an easier way?

Thank you!
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1664520720077709>
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1664520635535399>
Do you have the code?
just google TTF to Woff and you will find a converter online if you haven't found the fonts yet
awesome thanks guys!
